mapper.insert:
select seq_reply.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_reply (rno, bno, reply, replyer, replydate, updatedate) values (#{rno}, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, sysdate, sysdate)
mapper.select: select RNO ,BNO ,REPLY ,REPLYER ,REPLYDATE , CASE WHEN TO_CHAR(sysdate,'yyyymmdd') = TO_CHAR(updatedate,'yyyymmdd') THEN TO_CHAR(updatedate,'am hh:mi:ss') ELSE TO_CHAR(updatedate,'yyyy/mm/dd') END UPDATEDATE from tbl_reply where bno = #{bno} order BY bno ASC
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply= #{reply}, replyer = #{replyer}, updatedate = sysdate where rno = #{rno}
